name: Pruning Shears
description: Use to craft Leaf of Kudzu.

name: Recovered Pact Supplies
description: Contains recovered gear from Fleet Cargo.

name: Minstrel's Orichalcum Imbued Inscription
description: Used in the crafting of weapons with +Toughness, +Healing, +Concentration, and +Vitality.

name: Expertise in Longbow Crafting
description:
Use this expertise to craft a second-tier precursor.
<c=@flavor>Most informative.<c>

name: Recipe: Maklain's Greatbow
description: A recipe to make an ascended longbow with Minstrel's (+Toughness, +Healing, +Concentration, and +Vitality) stats.

name: Half-Eaten Backpack
description: Double-click to open.

name: Thesis on Learned Strength

details.description:
Gain 160 Power When Health above 90%
+10% Experience from Kills

description: Thesis: Double-click to set out a tome to share with anyone in the area. Stays active for 5 minutes.

name: Sector Zuhl Building Materials
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Kraitkin Vol. 1
description: Double-click to unlock the first collection in the journey to craft Venom, the precursor to the Legendary Trident, Kraitkin.

name: Recipe: Yassith's Short Bow
description: A recipe to make an ascended short bow with Viper's (+Condition Damage, +Power, +Expertise, and +Precision) stats.

name: Uncategorized Challenge Mote
description:
Complete the Uncategorized Challenge in the core tier (scale 21–50)! Beat the raving asura with an 80% reduction to all healing!
To activate challenge mode, speak with the challenge mote near the beginning of the fractal. A party vote is required to activate.

name: Essence of the Hunt
description: Use this essence of craft a completed precursor.

name: Recipe: Viper's Pearl Sabre
description: A recipe to make a Viper's Pearl Sabre.

name: Machined Torch Handle
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Ruined Fungal Spore
description: Use a harvesting sickle of higher quality to avoid ruining materials.

name: Oiled Hardened Boot Upper
description: Used to craft Hardened Leather Boots.

name: Superior Rune of Thorns

bonuses: +20% poison duration; gain 50 condition damage for 60 seconds when you're hit by a poisoned foe. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10 seconds)</c>

description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

name: Wolf Statue
description: Used to craft Howl.

name: The Theign Star Fragment
description: Combine the Jotun Star Fragments in the ruins of Leaning Grade in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.

name: Mini Snuggles
description: Double-click to summon this miniature to follow you around. Only one miniature may be in use at a time.

name: Purple Color Study
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

description: Used to make theses and sketchbooks.

description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Superior Rune of the Daredevil

bonuses: Next attack is guaranteed to crit after completing a dodge roll while in combat.

description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

name: Recovered Vigil Seal
description: Seal of a brave ally who fell fighting Mordremoth.

name: Golden Fractal Relic
description: Place four golden fractal relics in the Mystic Forge to receive a gold fractal weapon.

name: Dragonhunter's Auric Sharpening Stone

description: A recipe to make an ascended warhorn with Trailblazer's (+Toughness, +Condition Damage, +Expertise, and +Vitality) stats.

name: Megalodon Bone Meal
description: Use the bone meal to fertilize your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom.

name: Champion Ark the White Tiger Loot Box
description: This champion container has champion bags, dragonite ore, and empyreal fragments.

name: Box of Recipes: Storm (First Tier)
description: Unlocks all recipes needed to craft Storm (First Tier).

name: Gift of Insights
description: In the Mystic Forge, combine a Gift of Maguuma, a Gift of Insights, a Bloodstone Shard, and 250 Crystalline Ingots to create the Gift of Maguuma Mastery.

name: Manuscript of 'Proposal for a 1:1 Scale Map of Tyria'
Chest of Blooms
description: Contains the Essence of Blooms and recipes for first-tier Leaf of Kudzu.

name: Superior Sigil of Absorption

buff.description: Steal a boon when interrupting an enemy.

description: Double-click to apply to a weapon.

name: Recipe: Ossa's Artifact
description: A recipe to make an ascended focus with Crusader (+Power, +Toughness, +Ferocity, and +Healing) stats.

name: Tricks and Tips for Advanced Shield Crafting
description: Contains the book "Expertise in Shield Crafting" and recipes for the second-tier shield The Chosen.

name: Orr's Fall
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

description: Contains the Essence of Quaggan Friendship and recipes for completing Rage.

name: Putrid Ichor
description: Use the low-pressure environment of Goemm's Lab high above Metrica Province to safely combine 10 Bloodstone Dust with Putrid Ichor at a Console to form a Volatile Compound.

description: A recipe to make Viper's Emblazoned Boots.

description: Double-click to gain champion bags, dragonite ore, empyreal fragments, ley-line crystals, a vial of chak acid, and other gear.

name: Mist Offensive Potion

details.description: Outgoing damage in fractals is increased by 3% per stack. Outgoing condition damage in fractals is increased by 3% per stack.

description:
Increases outgoing damage in the Fractals of the Mists. Stacks up to 5 times.
With Fractal Attunement Mastery, converts a portion of your agony resistance to precision.
